SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, B.*, WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME WHR_REALNAME, WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME, WHDW.DPRTNAME WHDW_DRPTNAME, ( CASE WHEN B.ZT = 0 THEN '无效' WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '有效' END ) ZT_NAME, ( CASE WHEN B.IS_FX = 0 THEN '否' WHEN B.IS_FX = 1 THEN '是' END ) FX_VALUE, B.ZQZ || ( CASE WHEN B.ZQDW = 1 THEN '天' WHEN B.ZQDW = 2 THEN '月' WHEN B.ZQDW = 3 THEN '年' END ) FXJG,'课程代码:'||B.KCBH AS REC_HD,
(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END ) DATA_VERSION
FROM B_P_003_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.WHBMID WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from B_P_003_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj ) WHERE 2 >=RNO
